CustomField.description: A unique, business formatted code to identify an Opportunity record in the system.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: System to auto-generate a unique code in the below pattern. The number should increment sequentially starting from 00001. Where Engagement Record Type = ‘Research Partnership’ THEN RPE:00001 Where Engagement Record Type = ‘Commercialisation' THEN RCE:00001
CustomField.label: Engagement Code
